channel.title: Project Research on Tools for Academic Research
channel.description: Recent content in Project Research on Tools for Academic Research

item.title: SimilarStudies
item.description: Discover Related Medical Research Literature Instantly with Similar Studies.

item.title: ResearchMate.pro
item.description: Instantly Extract Insights from Medical Research Papers with ResearchMate.

item.title: Enago Read
item.description: Enago Read is an AI assistant that speeds up the literature review process, offering summaries and key insights to save researchers reading time. It boosts productivity with advanced AI technology and the Copilot feature, enabling real-time questions for deeper comprehension of extensive literature. (It was called RAx.)

item.title: StArt
item.description: StArt is a tool developed in an academic environment with scientific soundness that supports conducting systematic reviews.

item.title: Perplexity AI
item.description: Perplexity is your AI-powered Swiss Army Knife for information discovery and curiosity. It’s not just about answering questions; it’s about empowering you to do more—whether you’re looking to summarize content, explore new topics, or even get a little creative.

item.title: Cosma
item.description: Cosma is a document graph visualization tool. It modelizes interlinked Markdown files and renders them as an interactive network in a web interface. You can use Cosma to create a portable knowledge base, combining rich hypertextual descriptions with the affordances of a graph view, contextualized backlinks, automatically generated citations, metadata filters and more.

item.title: Inciteful
item.description: Find the most relevant literature using graphs and metrics.

item.title: Expontum
item.description: Expontum (https://www.expontum.com/) - Helps researchers quickly find knowledge gaps and identify what research projects have been completed before.

item.title: Synthical for Researchers
item.description: Discover, learn, and share research, made easy with our AI.

item.title: Sciencecast
item.description: ScienceCast is a free open-access platform for researchers to disseminate their scientific results and ideas to a wide audience of fellow scientists, journal Editors, grant program managers, and other professionals working at the cutting edge of science and innovation.

item.title: Scholarcy
item.description: The AI-powered article summarizer

item.title: A.R.I.A. (Aria)
item.description: Aria is Your AI Research Assistant Powered by Large Language Models

item.title: MyLabBook
item.description: An open source research platform or ELN based on WordPress and the FAIR Data Toolkit that is Sustainable, Affordable, FAIR, and Easy.

item.title: dimensions.ai
item.description: With Dimensions, you have free access to a vast collection of curated research outputs and tools that help you source exactly what you need to advance your own discoveries.

item.title: Heptabase
item.description: visual networked and mind-mapping note taking app

item.title: Scrintal
item.description: visual networked and mind-mapping note taking app

item.title: PaperDigest
item.description: Sci-Tech knowledge graph & text analysis platform for scientific literature tracking, summarization and search

item.title: Papers with Code
item.description: The mission of Papers with Code is to create a free and open resource with Machine Learning papers, code, datasets, methods and evaluation tables. There is also papers with code for physics, astronomy, and more.

item.title: Elicit
item.description: Elicit is a GPT-3 powered research assistant.

item.title: ReadPaper
item.description: A Chinese website for reading, managing, and discussing research papers online.

item.title: Research Rabbit
item.description: Discover and track literature

item.title: PaperPanda
item.description: PaperPanda is a chrome extension to access the PDF files of research papers by automatically searching the web. So our research is not blocked by the paywall.

item.title: papers-with-video
item.description: A browser extension that adds video explanations to research papers on arxiv.org

item.title: PubPeer
item.description: The online journal club of research articles with comments.

item.title: Artigopapers
item.description: Explore scientific, technical, and medical research on Artigo

item.title: Hypothesis
item.description: Collaborative or private note taking on the web. Highlight and annotate websites in distinct notebooks.

item.title: Litmaps
item.description: Navigate the literature with interactive visualisations of citation networks and discover science faster

item.title: SciWheel
item.description: Reference Manager to discover, read, annotate, write and share scientific research

item.title: Endnote Click
item.description: A browser extension to read and download papers for free and legally.

item.title: Deepnote
item.description: Data science notebooks for teams

item.title: MyMind
item.description: MyMind is an idea note, quote, page, and image collector with the usual tag-style support. You add material from the web via a capable browser plugin; but, the standout feature is AI help in your search/retrieval of information, even without tags. It displays your saved material in a card grid—think Pinterest, Pocket, and similar—with selectable density and size. A large search box sits at the top with instant results while you type.

item.title: WizdomAI
item.description: Understand the journals and institutes through publications

item.title: Scrapbox
item.description: A knowledge base that lets you capture notes, code, and research lightning-fast. Everything adds to a web of ideas that’s easy to use at scale.

item.title: Connected Papers
item.description: Explore connected papers in a visual graph

item.title: RAx - Your Personal Smart Research Assistant (Rebranded to Enago Read)
item.description: (Rebranded to Enago Read) Speed up literature analysis and comprehension with RAx. Smart assistant to explore, collate insights and organize your research easily.

item.title: MarginNote
item.description: Efficient and visual note-taking and knowledge management while reading

item.title: Sci-Hub - Academic Papers for All
item.description: sh can helping people getting academic papers for free

item.title: Semantic Scholar
item.description: Semantic Scholar uses groundbreaking AI and engineering to understand the semantics of scientific literature to help Scholars discover relevant research.

item.title: AMiner
item.description: AI Powered Research Career: rankings of researchers, academic institutes, and conferences; trends of research topics; datasets for research.

item.title: Unpaywall
item.description: An open database of free scholarly articles for you to legally download research papers for free.

item.title: Phylopic
item.description: Free silhouette images of animals, plants, and other life forms, available for reuse under a Public Domain or Creative Commons license.

item.title: Scholarpedia
item.description: the peer-reviewed open-access encyclopedia, where knowledge is curated by communities of experts.

item.title: Protocols Io
item.description: Create, share, and collaborate on protocals. Protocals.io is not only for biologist, it can be used for any protocals.

item.title: Iris AI
item.description: Speed up literature review

item.title: Arxiv Sanity
item.description: Web interface for browsing, search and filtering recent arxiv submissions

item.title: Scirate
item.description: free and open access scientific collaboration network

item.title: Paperscape
item.description: Paperscape is an interactive map that visualises the arXiv, an open, online repository for scientific research papers.

item.title: IQSS: The Institute for Quantitative Social Science
item.description: The Institute for Quantitative Social Science

item.title: ICPSR: Inter-university Consortium for Political and Social Research
item.description: Inter-university Consortium for Political and Social Research

item.title: OpenEI
item.description: Linked energy information on hundreds of topics crowdsourced from industry and government agencies.

item.title: Archaeology Data Service
item.description: Certified repository for Archaeology data
